name: Letter Snap
description:
Letter Snap is an easy to learn and easy to play word game. Just drag the rows and columns of letters to create words. Featuring two play styles. The levels are not timed allowing you to play at your own pace and your current game is saved if you need to leave and come back later.

Letter Snap levels are based off common everyday english words. The levels range in complexity offering 10 different levels of increasing difficulty as you progress.

The freestyle game mode allows you to create as many possible words, keeping track of your high score.

The concept of Letter Snap was inspired by traditional word searches and the famous Rubik's Cube.
